attributes.action: How to save millions and do thie right thing! ***PLEASE READ***
attributes.additional_details: i think its unbelievable how people or should i say criminals/murderers/rapists get treated in prison its a joke why pay out millions /billions of £s supplying these people with nice beds, wardrobes, tv's, computers, education, gym, ect ect.... it is a JOKE!! and needs to be stopped, prison should be a place where people do not want to be. PLEASE THINK ABOUT THIS its is also so sad because think of all the homeless people out there, if things don't change my advice to them would be ROB A BANK!! you will then go 2 ways, get away and be rich or go to prison and get a nice warm bed to sleep in with 3 meals a day.
